text: @GregAbbott_TX Dear Greg Abbott,The summer is a good timing zone to kill Coronavirus, I suggest that you can send an order to property managers to adjust AC into heat model from cool mode during night hours every day in the summer.Heat air of AC will kill Coronavirus in hours in the buildings .
